request.name: VmHighRam
request.command: insert into VMHighRam select * from VM having vcpuConsumption > 90

request.name: VmHighCpu
request.command: insert into VMHighCpu select * from VM having vcpuConsumption > 90

request.name: CoHighRT
request.command: insert into CoHighRT select * from Co.win:length(3) having responseTime > 70

request.name: vmHighCpu_CoHighRT
request.command: select VHR from VMHighRam.win:time(10 sec) as VHR, CoHighRT.win:time(1 sec) as CHR where CHR.vm = VHR

request.name: TierOverloaded
request.command: select VM.tier from VM group by tier having avg(VM.vcpuConsumption) > 95
